sentences.sentence: Because node structures go in only one direction, they know nothing about the sequence of nodes that precede them.
sentences.translation: 由于节点结构只指向一个方向，所以它们完全不了解它们之前的节点的顺序。

sentences.sentence: They may suggest radiotherapy to the lymph nodes above your supraclavicular fossa.
sentences.translation: 他们可能建议你对锁骨上窝上方的淋巴结进行放射治疗。
